meanings.sent1: The prearranged meeting went smoothly as everyone knew the plan in advance.
meanings.sent2: The prearranged schedule helped us stay organized and on track.
meanings.sent3: The prearranged picnic turned into a surprise party when friends showed up early.
meanings.sent4: Her prearranged outfit for the event made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The prearranged fireworks display lit up the night sky beautifully.

meanings.sent1: Their prearranged vacation allowed them to book all the activities ahead of time.
meanings.sent2: The prearranged agreement ensured that both parties were clear on the terms.
meanings.sent3: The prearranged movie night turned into a marathon with back-to-back films.
meanings.sent4: His prearranged speech captivated the audience with its thoughtful content.
meanings.sent5: The prearranged surprise party left her speechless with joy.
